extendedInfo.description: --------------Download this FREE demo and see what Dragon's Lair has to offer. This HD version is perfect for tablets and higher resolution phones. See our FREE SD version for phones or devices with low internal memory or resolution. --------------Now you can experience the best in retro gaming on-the-go with Dragonâs Lair on your Android device! Both the phone and tablet editions included for one low price!Immerse yourself in the visually stunning world of hand-drawn animation adapted from the original smash hit arcade classic. Transferred from the original high definition master film, youâll experience this fully arcade authentic experience right in the palm of your hand.Simply press on the direction pad to guide our hero Dirk The Daring in the correct direction. Use your sword to take on all that the Evil Wizard Mordroc throws your way.This version of Don Bluth's Dragonâs Lair is fully compatible with Android 1.6 through to the current release. In fact weâve included full compatibility for phones and tablets! Weâve even remastered the footage for a variety of screen resolutions so all devices can experience Dragonâs Lair in all its glory.Enjoy!Dragon's Lair is XPERIA PLAY Optimized. --------------Discover all that Digital Leisure Offers:Web: http://www.digitalleisure.com/android/games/Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/DigitalLeisureTwitter: http://www.twitter.com/digitalleisure--------------

reviews.title: Bit of improvement needed
reviews.comment: Loved the old stand up arcade game, but reaction times needed are too short. I find myself looking at the controls vs. enjoying the wonderful animation.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Controls need a lot of work
reviews.comment: In the full arcade version one could keep their hands on the controls and play.  The tablet version you have to stare at the controls and miss all the nice art work.  This game is a an exercise in mere mindless pressing buttons with no reward of the visuals. Too bad I really used to like this game.
reviews.author: Rob Frydryck

reviews.title: Screen times out almost immediately
reviews.comment: If you continuously press any of the directional buttons the screen stays on and animation keeps going. But if you stop pressing the buttons the screen turns off completely.  It returns to the main menu screen when you turn the screen back on.
reviews.author: Marvin Oubre

reviews.title: Needs gestures
reviews.comment: It\'s nice, but the on screen controls really take away from the game play.  And it tells you exactly when and which direction to click.    Why not put the clue flashes back in the video like the original game, remove the on screen controls and use gesture controls instead?  Swipe the screen up, down, left or right for direction.  Tap the screen for sword.    Then you could watch the video as you play and not worry so much about the controls.
reviews.author: James Smith

reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy Tab 10.1 Perfect :)
reviews.comment: Would like a option for using the Icade... We the android community, ask You Digital Leisure Where Is \"SPACE ACE\"
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I wanted to like it, but the screen keeps turning off ruining the experience.
reviews.author: Jeppe \303\230land

reviews.title: Needs Work
reviews.comment: Loved playing the arcade when i was younger. But this version has my screen all distorted with various lines of color. Good thing i dl the demo instead of outright buy the full version. Please fix this ASAP!!! I will definatley buy once fixed.  Quattro 4G Cool Pad 5860E
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Screen times out
reviews.comment: As soon as the game starts the screen dims and blocks controls...plz fix
reviews.author: Phaust Mesphistopheles

reviews.title: Looks lovely but can barely play it
reviews.comment: I LOVE Dragons Lair, and am glad I didn\'t buy the paid version, also makes me weary of getting Space Ace because as all the other reviews state the screen dims a few second into play on each scene, unless you\'re sat poking the screen to interrupt it, it will just turn the device off! I don\'t usually say it,but what bad quality!
reviews.author: Charlotte Woolley

reviews.title: Still not much of a game
reviews.comment: Cool movie though.  The fact that the directional pad is on the right instead of the left is pretty indicative of the fact that the developers haven\'t played a proper game in quite awhile. This property has been shoveled everywhere, now it\'s on Android.  If you\'re into it, this is what you\'ve played before.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Better
reviews.comment: As a retro video game, should have been left on the arcade
reviews.author: Eamon Fitzgerald

reviews.title: Crashes on my N7
reviews.comment: Dies as he is walking across the drawbridge
reviews.author: Lisa C

reviews.title: L2dab
reviews.comment: Great original!! Even easier to play than the arcade version
reviews.author: Larry Broadie

reviews.title: Unplayable
reviews.comment: The screen times out don\'t want to pay for the app if this one doesn\'t work.
reviews.author: David Dishauzi

reviews.title: still stupid
reviews.comment: it didnt play properly 20 years ago... and it still doesnt.... uninstalled.. crap...
reviews.author: David morrison

reviews.title: Meh
reviews.comment: Looks just like I remember but really after all this time really doesn\'t hold up in the game play department. Just a matter of remembering the right inputs just like the modern games QTE try the demo and see for yourself but it\'s a pass for me when there are many more games in the market place that are worth your money :-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Hasn\'t been tested
reviews.comment: Screen times out. Lazy devs. Hints shouldn\'t be on the pad but on the screen
reviews.author: Ross Bines

reviews.title: Great Classic but some issues
reviews.comment: The screen quickly times out unless you keep tapping the screen and this also a trial version.
reviews.author: Thomas Stacy

reviews.title: Does not work on GS4
reviews.comment: I am a huge fan of Don Bluth\'s games, but this demo dims the screen then puts my phone to sleep on the castle intro screen on my Galaxy S4. Uninstalled and will buy once it works.
reviews.author: Dave Gaussiran

reviews.title: Alex
reviews.comment: Love it so machhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh
reviews.author: natalia yousef
